title: Exploring e-Learning Effectiveness for Engineering Education: Utilizing Virtual Environments and Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A course exploring e-learning tool applications in engineering education for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: They can analyze the impact of content provided in a Virtual Learning Environment (VLE) on understanding engineering concepts.
They can apply multivariate statistical methods to evaluate the effectiveness of simulation-based learning tools.
They can design an evaluation system to empirically validate the learning effectiveness of digitally designed resources for engineering education.

resources: Virtual environment platform for engineering education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
